name: SpaceJunkers: Astroid Escape
description:
Play as a junker who needs to shoot their way out of a asteroid field . On the way you will be attacked by  unexpected security drones. What will you do, how long will you survive? Shoot down the obstacles and get points. Challenge a friend and see who gather most points. 

Made by:

Northypark

Malfarian

Kaitzune
